results.title: A discovery of freedom
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. This story is a document of 17 year-old Tom’s experiences in the Eureka 150 youth team. “..I realised that my freedoms and rights were things I had taken for granted”.

results.title: A Disastrous day
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Abby Dietrich and ACMI
results.brief_description: It was a typical morning in Lennox Head for Abby Dietrich and her mother, when things changed dramatically. A tornado and intense storm were followed by calls from friends and family, and the community checking up on each other, helping out and cleaning up.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Abby Dietrich and ACMI

results.title: A Disappearing trick
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The wonderful world of Paddington Bear”.
Adapted from the book ” A Bear called Paddington”. Paddington puts on a magic show for the Brown Family, Mr. Gruber and Mr. Curry. After repeatedly annoying Mr. Curry in the course of his demonstration of magic tricks, Paddington decides it is time to disappear.

results.title: A Director talks about his film
results.creator_credit: Prospective Films, Susan Krebs, Peter Riegert and David Grotenstein
results.brief_description: A satirical film depicting an interview with an Italian film director, Aldo Altonandino who’s remarks in Italian are translated into English by a deadpanned, uninvolved female interpreter. As he gets carried away by his pseudo-eloquence the translator continues in robot-like fashion. As the camera pulls back, the real director appears explaining his idea for the film.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Prospective Films, Susan Krebs, Peter Riegert and David Grotenstein

results.title: A Dignified exit
results.creator_credit: Brian Blake and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Examines the moral and legal issues involved in the future publication of a manual describing ‘How to commit suicide effectively’ to be published by EXIT- The Society for the Right to Die with Dignity, and also hears the views of three women who have known great suffering through ill-health.

results.title: A Different kind of winning
results.creator_credit: David Streit, Rad Pictures, Learning Corporation of America and Stephen Gyllenhaal
results.brief_description: Although she loves skateboarding, Jody is uneasy when her father insists that she participate in a skateboard competition, expecially as she would be competing against her best friend. Based on the book “Skateboard scramble” by Barbara Douglas.

results.title: A Different approach
results.creator_credit: Belfern Productions, Fern Field and Jim Belcher
results.brief_description: A young filmmaker, hired to make a sombre straight-forward film about the reasons employers should hire the disabled, decides instead to take an innovative, irreverent approach to what is usually a piously hush-hush subject. The film shows him screening his film to an incredulous audience and trying to convince them that his different approach is the right one. Stars Michael Keaton with cameo appearances by Martin Mull, Ed Asner, Jim Nabors and Carroll O’Connor.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Belfern Productions, Fern Field and Jim Belcher

results.title: A Desperate fortune: Matthew Flinders' Australia
results.creator_credit: Jack Smith, A to Z Communications and Antony J. Bowman
results.brief_description: A documentary style drama depicting the life and times of one of Australia’s greatest explorers. Matthew Flinders was the first man to circumnavigate the vast island continent known in the 18th century as New Holland. However few people are aware that he was also the first person to formally name it Australia. This is not simply a story of an extraordinary man’s courage and perseverance throughout a series of arduous voyages, but a romantic adventure fraught with all the inevitable dangers and excitement of conquering an untamed land. Narrated by Edward Woodward.
